data.eml:eml: Onconeura, a new Neotropical orthoclad genus (Chironomidae, Orthocladiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Andersen, Trond, Saether, Ole A. (2005): Onconeura, a new Neotropical orthoclad genus (Chironomidae, Orthocladiinae). Zootaxa 957: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171214
